content.question: Which of the following actions are appropriate when providing psychological first aid? (Select all that apply)

answers.option: Calm the person and support their breathing.
Tell them to stop shaking immediately.
Contact emergency services if help is not already on the way.
Assist them in contacting supportive family or friends.
Grab them and remove them from the scene.

content.correct: Correct! Calm support, contacting EMS, and linking to family/friends are appropriate PFA actions.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answers are: Calm support, contact EMS, and link to family/friends.
